faq.question: What types of real estate documents can I summarize?
faq.answer: All of them! Purchase agreements, leases, HOA documents, seller disclosures, title reports, inspection reports, loan documents, and more. If it's a PDF, we can summarize it.

faq.question: Will the AI catch important red flags?
faq.answer: The AI highlights unusual clauses, liens, easements, and potential issues. However, always review with a real estate attorney for complex transactions. Think of it as a smart first pass.

faq.question: How secure are client documents?
faq.answer: Very secure! All documents are encrypted at rest and in transit. We're SOC 2 certified and never share your data or use it to train our AI. Your client confidentiality is protected.

faq.question: What plan is best for real estate agents?
faq.answer: Most agents use the Starter plan ($9/mo) with 250 pages/month for reviewing contracts and disclosures. High-volume agents or teams should consider the Pro ($19/mo) or Team plan ($49/mo).

faq.question: Can my whole team share summaries?
faq.answer: Yes! The Team plan ($49/mo) allows unlimited users to share and collaborate on property documents. Perfect for brokerages and investment firms.

faq.question: Can I use this on my phone during showings?
faq.answer: Absolutely! SummarizePDF works on any device. Upload a contract from your phone and get a summary in seconds. Perfect for answering client questions on the go.
